original_text: But when Gallio was proconsul of Achaia, the Jews made a united attack on Paul and brought him before the tribunal,
korean_text: 갈리오가 아가야 총독 되었을 때에 유대인이 일제히 일어나 바울을 대적하여 법정으로 데리고 가서

sentences.original_text: But when Gallio was proconsul of Achaia,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 갈리오가 아가야의 총독으로 있을 때에,

sentences.original_text: the Jews made a united attack on Paul
and brought him before the tribunal,
